title: (x) Autodesk logo - (similar to) Vigor {Dav}
content:
First time posting.... (search broken?)

I'm contracting for Autodesk and as insane as this may sound, NO-ONE I talk to in the marketing \_or\_ graphics dept knows what font is used in Autodesk's new logo [seen here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219143827/http:/www.autodesk.com/) in the top left corner of the page.

Any help in determining the font's name is GREATLY appreciated.
author: slord

comments.content:
' [Vigor](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219143827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/vigor-dt/)', _by Malcolm Wooden / DTP Types_.?

_( Just a note.: This thread should rather be in the ' [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219143827/http:/typophile.com/forum/29)' part of Typophile, than here.. )_
Sweet thanks, I'll familiarize myself with the forum some more to better position my posts. Thanks again!
